messages.content: Don’t risk five long years of Corbyn in charge

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Initial funding secured for our hospital and we saved Ely Minor Injuries Unit. I will work for more local health provision.
Achieved 97% superfast broadband in Cambs. I will work to ensure coverage for more remote premises.
With a commitment of 20,000 more police officers, I will work to ensure we get our fair share here.
Already built the Ely Bypass & spearheaded the A10 upgrade campaign. Let's also secure improvements to A142/A14 junction and get better bus services.
Already secured millions more for our schools. I am working for more money and better mental health support.
I will continue to work with councils and government to reduce carbon emissions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority. The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty. SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

issues.education: SCHOOL FUNDING: Already secured millions more for our schools. I am working for more money and better mental health support.
issues.environment: BETTER ENVIRONMENT: I will continue to work with councils and government to reduce carbon emissions.

SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote. Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.

community.content: Achieved 97% superfast broadband in Cambs. I will work to ensure coverage for more remote premises.

quotes.text: John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister. With five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
Jo Swinson says no to second Tory alliance

I will continue to work with councils and government to reduce carbon emissions.

Initial funding secured for our hospital and we saved Ely Minor Injuries Unit. I will work for more local health provision.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.
The Lib Dems have ruled out a coalition with the Conservatives. So a hung parliament means Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
SNP to back Labour government only with Scottish independence vote.
Corbyn would have to be propped up by the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain.
Don’t risk five long years of Corbyn in charge
John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.
